attributes.action: a vote of no confidence in the present labour government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: your party is not looking after the welfare and status of the working man/woman (taxpayer). the people who put you there in the first place. you are totally out of touch with the needs of the man/woman on the street. you only care about your own welfare

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
